headline: Assessing CarMax After a 54% Slide and Recent Rebound in 2025
summary: If you are wondering whether CarMax is a bargain or a value trap at current levels, you are not alone. This article will walk through what the numbers actually say about the stock. After a rough stretch that has left shares down 54.3% over the last year and 52.6% year to date, the recent 12.5% climb over the past month, despite a 6.2% dip this week, suggests sentiment might be starting to shift. Much of the recent price action has been driven by changing expectations around used car demand,...
